version_description:
Direct audio recording for Apple Watch(required watchOS 2)
Improved usability
Fixed some bugs

• Share recordings via the Finder(iCloud Drive)
• Manage categories from your Apple Watch
• Ability to make recording from the other apps
• Adjustable recording template
• Fast rewind during pause-recording to correct current recording
• Control the recording process from the control centre
• Start recording by the app launch
• Import additional audio formats from the other apps
• Opportunity to switch off the Touch ID for the Lock Screen option
• Edit category name
• Bug fixes

The ability to add photos and notes
New design
New alternative skin and possibility to change it
3D Touch support for icon app
Bug fixes

The ability to send an audio recording as a zip file along with its bookmarks (text notes, photos)
Improved working with VoiceOver
Ability to save audio recordings in the photo album
Fixed the issue with the bluetooth controls
Bug fixes
Bug fixes

Improved communication with Apple Watch
Additional features for saving recordings to online storages
Today widget support
Bug fixes

Support iPhone X
Support for sending recordings using WebDAV
History list for audio recordings which have not been played yet
Option to choose audio inputs
Improved the Accessibility
Bug fixes

• Support for sending recordings using SharePoint
• Added new playback speed
• Improved the Accessibility
• Improved usability
• Bug fixes

• Apple Watch direct recording in the background(watchOS 4.0 or newer)
• Apple Watch direct playback in the background(watchOS 5.0 or newer)
• Added new send method
• Bug fixes

• Option to instantly start sound recording by running the app on the Apple Watch
• Color marking of sent audio recordings
• New complications for the Apple Watch
• Improved usability
• Bug fixes
Bug fixes

• Forward/Rewind playback(discrete in sec.)
• Forward/Rewind recording(discrete in sec.)
• Improved usability

• Improved usability on the Apple Watch
• Delete audio recordings directly on Apple Watch
• Bug fixes

• Improved working with VoiceOver
• Improved usability
• Bug fixes
• Fixed bug with the Lock screen for iOS 13
• Improved usability of audio bookmarks

• Improved usability on the Apple Watch.
• Bug fixes

• Voice monitoring during audio recording
• Ability to redirect voice monitoring to Bluetooth headphones
• Improved usability
• Bug fixes

• Improved working with VoiceOver
• Improved usability
• Polish and Czech localizations

• Improved working with VoiceOver
• Improved usability
• Bug fixes

• Improved working with VoiceOver
• Fixed recording bug with iCloud option

• Support for iOS/iPadOS 14
• Stereo recording for built-in microphones (requires iOS/iPadOS 14, not all iOS/iPadOS devices support this option)
